author: cnbc.com
title: Heron Therapeutics: 1Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
SAN DIEGO (AP) _ Heron Therapeutics Inc. (HRTX) on Thursday reported a loss of $52.3 million in its first quarter.
On a per-share basis, the San Diego-based company said it had a loss of 81 cents.
The results topped Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of six analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for a loss of 82 cents per share.
The pharmaceutical company posted revenue of $11.6 million in the period, which also topped Street forecasts. Five analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $11.3 million.
Heron Therapeutics shares have risen 68 percent since the beginning of the year. The stock has risen 94 percent in the last 12 months.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on HRTX at https://www.zacks.com/ap/HRTX
